title: Emmerdale spoilers: Charity's shocking secret, Kim's devastating betrayal
text:
There are all sorts of secrets coming to light in Emmerdale as two families are ripped apart by major discoveries and betrayals. As it emerges that Charity Dingle (Emma Atkins) helped Mandy (Lisa Riley) with her casino scam, the Dingle family close ranks. But there’s another major bombshell to be dropped.

Over at Home Farm, Kim Tate (Claire King) determines to get to the bottom of who Graham Foster (Andrew Scarborough) is seeing and she thinks she has her answer. But a dramatic discovery is set to turn her whole world upside down.

Here’s what’s happening over in the Dales…

10 Emmerdale spoilers Mandy is forced to face Dingle court when she attempts to steal from Lydia.

Kim is jealous as she knows Graham is seeing someone else.

Charity is revealed to have been working with Mandy and Vinny.

Andrea is hopeful that she will be rid of Graham soon.

The aftermath of the boat explosion hits those impacted hard.

Jamie tackles Graham about his disloyalty to Kim.

Mandy fears that the Dingles will discover Vinny isn’t her son.

Aaron continues to fall apart without Robert.

Kim discovers that Jamie was to blame for the evidence that sent her down.

The Dingles are in danger as Mandy’s enemies attack.

Monday 28th October

With figures having been watching them, Mandy and Vinny are making plans to flee the village – but then Vinny has another suggestion. They attempt to withdraw money from Lydia’s account but are caught and face the wrath of the Dingles. With the net closing in, they go into hiding after stealing the van.

Meanwhile, Amy is shocked by a betrayal.

Tuesday 29th October

Hour long episode.

Mandy faces the music as the Dingles hold court and she points out the hypocrisy after everything that happened with Aaron. Mandy reveals the truth – and it soon emerges that Vinny is hiding a secret while Charity also was involved.

Meanwhile, Graham makes an admission.

Wednesday 30th October

With the truth out in the open, Mandy and Vinny are public enemy number one with the Dingles while Charity is also in an uncomfortable position. Things get even worse when Terry and his cohorts rock up and threaten violence.

Leanna gives Jacob food for thought as sparks fly while Jamie discovers that Graham is dating Rhona and wants to tell a jealous Kim.

Thursday 31st October Part One

As Doug reveals a truth, Noah is jealous of Jacob and Leanna.

Meanwhile, Kim is stunned as she discovers that Rhona and Graham are an item and feels jealous. But she is about to learn another shocking secret.

Thursday 31st October Part Two

Kim is seething as she reels from the truth that Jamie is the one who got her locked up. As she plots revenge, it’s clear that both Jamie and Graham have a lot to be worried about.

Doug makes a confession to Laurel while Leanna kisses Jacob.

Friday 1st November

As Kim lashes out and makes more plans, Rhona faces more opposition over her relationship with Graham when Marlon has a go. Snapping, Rhona lashes out at Marlon and defends herself.

Elsewhere there are big changes at the farm while someone receives life changing news.
